availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas W. Bullock (Scott County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Bullock. Father of M. B. Bullock. Farmer in Scott County in 1850. Owned nine enslaved persons in Scott County in 1850.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 2, p. 454. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County. Find A Grave, "Thomas Bullock (1819-1883)," Memorial #100558683, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/100558683/thomas-bullock (accessed January 24, 2018).
